Statute.Title: Red Tape Reduction Act
Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Réduction de la paperasse, Loi sur la)

Minister.Text: Introduced by the President of the Treasury Board

General.Text: General, 2015, c. 12, ss. 9 and 10 (Annual Report) and 11 (Review of Act)
General, 2018, c. 12, s. 263 (report, application of ss. 5 and 5.1)

CIF.Text: CIF, 2015, c. 12, Act in force on assent 23.04.2015
CIF, 2018, c. 12 (assent: 21.06.2018), ss. 257 to 263 come into force on a day to be fixed by order of the Governor in Council see s. 264 — Not in force
